Hong Kong judges dismiss appeal in sedition case for pro-democracy radio hostThree Hong Kong High Court judges on Thursday rejected an appeal by prominent pro-democracy activist Tam Tak-chi against his conviction and 40 month sentence for 11 sedition charges that his lawyer had argued was a disproportionate restriction on freedom of speech. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 03:54:23 GMT 6VHUYFKM2JKD7JBIIGONHQNZXY https://www.reuters.com/world/hong-kong-judges-dismiss-appeal-sedition-case-pro-democracy-radio-host-2024-03-07/Jessie Pang世界
Australia to make pension contributions for workers on paid parental leaveAustralia said on Thursday that it would make pension contributions for workers who take paid parental leave, the latest effort by the centre-left Labor government to address gender imbalance in the workplace. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 03:31:31 GMT MVVXWBLFCVLNFEQWRZEROO2WSE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-make-pension-contributions-workers-paid-parental-leave-2024-03-07/Reuters可持续发展可持续财务与报告
Ocean temperature hit record high in February 2024, EU scientists sayOcean temperatures hit a record high in February, with the average global sea surface temperature at 21.06 degrees Celsius (69.91 degrees Fahrenheit), the EU's Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S) said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 03:06:17 GMT WC6GLMXRRMN3JNPGPUS7SGS6A https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/ocean-Temperature-hit-record-high-february-2024-eu-scientists-say-2024-03-07/Gloria Dickie可持续发展气候与能源
China to offer visa-free travel to travellers from six countriesChina will offer visa-free travel to nationals from Switzerland, Ireland, Hungary, Australia, Belgium and Luxemborg from March 14, foreign minister Wang Yi said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 03:05:51 GMT阿古德纳拉克农瑞格夫JFGDUH5RY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-offers-visa-free-travel-to-six-countries-2024-03-07/Reuters世界中国
US has a wrong perception of China, says foreign ministerThe U.S. continues to hold the wrong perception of China and has yet to fulfill its promises despite some progress since presidents Joe Biden and Xi Jinping met last November, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 02:32:09 GMT QEO2QXMHVBKRTJTLX6NW5OMWRU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/us-has-wrong-perception-china-says-foreign-minister-2024-03-07/Bernard Orr, Ethan Wang世界中国
China to foster new cooperation and consolidate friendship with RussiaChina is willing to work with Russia to foster new drivers of cooperation and consolidate friendship, foreign minister Wang Yi told a news conference on the sidelines of an annual parliament meeting in Beijing. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 02:22:57 GMT 3BFO7VRWH5P2HDXIS53VGHOLD https://www.reuters.com/world/china-fosters-new-cooperation-consolidate-friendship-with-Russia-2024-03-07/Reuters世界
U.S. military says it conducted strikes against two unmanned aerial vehicles in YemenThe U.S. military said on Wednesday that it carried out strikes against two unmanned aerial vehicles in a Houthi-controlled area of Yemen that "presented an imminent threat to merchant vessels and U.S. Navy ships in the region." Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:53:38 GMT WZU6WX4FMZPIXLN4IRKZOXVN7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-military-says-it-conducted-strikes-against-two-unmanned-aerial-vehicles-yemen-2024-03-07/Reuters世界中东地区
China steps up grey-zone warfare to exhaust Taiwan, defence report saysChina has stepped up grey-zone warfare against Taiwan, aiming to make the areas around the democratic island "saturated" with balloons, drones and civilian boats, a Taiwan defence ministry report said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:40:24 GMT 6ODBCRVXMVN3HOFQSRGHUZ57SI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-steps-up-gray-zone-warfare-exhaust-taiwan-defence-report-says-2024-03-07/Yimou Lee世界中国
More Chinese women choosing singledom as economy stuttersFreelance copywriter Chai Wanrou thinks marriage is an unfair institution. Like many young women in China, she is part of a growing movement that envisions a future with no husband and no children, presenting the government with a challenge it could do without. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:10:32 GMT DWIYTGTRRVIS3FJMZUFNBDIUAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/more-chinese-women-choosing-singledom-economy-stutters-2024-03-07/Laurie Chen世界中国
Australia and Vietnam upgrade relations, to begin talks on critical mineralsAustralian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Thursday the country was elevating ties with Vietnam to a comprehensive strategic partnership, opening an annual dialogue on critical minerals amid a push to diversify supply chains away from China. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 01:06:48 GMT BU3H2AVDMZJHLIY6BHLQ4JD6YU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-upgrades-relations-with-vietnam-strategic-partnership-2024-03-07/Alasdair Pal世界亚太地区
UK's Cameron heads to Germany for talks on Ukraine, GazaBritish foreign minister David Cameron will discuss boosting support for Ukraine and efforts to get more humanitarian aid into Gaza in talks with his German counterpart Annalena Baerbock in Berlin on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 00:10:06 GMT DUPAPJBR2ZK2TKSMM2X6JWFMUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uks-cameroon-heads-germany-talks-ukraine-gaza-2024-03-07/Reuters世界欧洲
